item.title: New Contao Versions in short intervalls
item.description: The Contao community works hard to continuously improve Contao. Therefore several updates are released each year. The last release was Contao 3.3.

item.title: New Contao Community Members each day
item.description: More and more web developers join the Contao community each day. Therefore Contao is able to evolve contantly.

item.title: Contao is popular
item.description: In a recent security level comparison Contao excelled as one of the most secure Open Source CMS's.
